titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Resources for American Literary Study Collection 1973-1976
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library M 37
titlepage.publisher: James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University

defitem.label: Funding:
defitem.item: Web version of the finding aid funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University
did.unittitle:
Resources for American Literary Study Collection
1973-1976
did.origination: Drs. Maurice Duke and Thomas Inge.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for use without restrictions.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box/folder, Resources for American Literary Study Collection, M 37, Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was donated to the Department by the journal's editors Drs. Maurice Duke and Thomas Inge between the years 1973 and 1980.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collection processed in January 1977 and revised in May 1990.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: This is a collection of manuscripts and articles found in Resources for American Literary Study.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of manuscripts and proofs of the articles in Volumes I-VI of Resources for American Literary Study (1973-1976). There is also some editorial correspondence. Resources was published biannually by VCU and the University of Maryland.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged chronologically by volume and issue. Articles within each issue are arranged alphabetically by author.
